title: Ticket #5868: Replace param(EC2_GAHP_RATE_LIMIT) with command-line flag in EC2 GAHP.
description: This will make it easier to pretend that the EC2 GAHP and the annex GAHP are different systems, which I think is a good idea for system administration reasons.
remarks:
2016-Nov-30 18:27:36 by tlmiller:
The proposed fix was changed to replacing the EC2_GAHP part of that knob name to be the GAHP's subsystem name, since it can now be changed (as part of cleaning up the configuration of the annexd).
check_ins:

2016-Aug-30 16:18   Check-in [49108]: (#5868) Remove a FIXME that's become a ticket (#5868). (By Todd L Miller )
